changelog.title: LinuxTerminal.js Engine
changelog.description: Comprehensive shared terminal engine with 40+ commands, virtual filesystem, tab completion, pipes, and redirection.

changelog.title: L-002: File Navigation
changelog.description: New lab covering pwd, ls, cd, and directory navigation using the shared terminal engine.

changelog.title: Full-Featured Terminal
changelog.description: All terminal features available from the start - no cumulative unlocks, realistic Linux experience.
